solution_line_template: If Sally sold 30% more lemonade this week, she sold {initial_sales} * {increase_percentage} = <<{initial_sales}*{increase_percentage}={additional_sales_this_week}>>{additional_sales_this_week} more cups this week.
This week, Sally sold {initial_sales} + {additional_sales_this_week} = <<{initial_sales}+{additional_sales_this_week}={sales_this_week}>>{sales_this_week} cups of lemonade.
In total for both weeks, Sally sold {initial_sales} + {sales_this_week} = <<{initial_sales}+{sales_this_week}={total_sales}>>{total_sales} cups of lemonade.
